name: Gamecube Intro Simulator
description:
The Gamecube intro but you can control the cube and move around and draw things!

A short while ago I created the Gamecube Intro But Its a Snake Game project for a meme. Since then I have received some really helpful feedback, which has led to the creation of this project, which I will be adding more features to as they are requested from you guys. Thanks for the support!

You can find the earlier game here: https://r1g.itch.io/gamecube-intro-but-its-a-snake-game

 It will not be receiving any more updates but this one certainly will; let the feedback/suggestions/request train begin!

Controls

Arrow Keys - Movement
